Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class Client

      class Client extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • addIndex
          JTextField addIndex
          The JTextField addIndex takes userinput for the index where the user wishes to insert an element into the linked list
        • addSubmitButton
          JButton addSubmitButton
          The JButton addSubmitButton is the button the user clicks to submit their add request to the server class
        • addValue
          JTextField addValue
          The JTextField addValue takes userinput for the value that the user wishes to insert as an element into the linked list.
        • deleteIndex
          JTextField deleteIndex
          The JTextField deleteIndex takes userinput as to the index of the index corresponding to the element in the linkedlist that the client wants to be deleted
        • deleteSubmitButton
          JButton deleteSubmitButton
          The JButton deleteSubmitButton is the button the user clicks to submit their delete request to the server class
        • edithistory
          JTextArea edithistory
          The JTextArea editHistory contains all of the packets sent and received by an instance of the Client class.
        • socket
          DatagramSocket socket
          The DatagramSocket socket serves as the funnel through which Dataagram pakcets are sent and received.

    • Class Server

      class Server extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • edithistory
          JTextArea edithistory
          The JText Area edithistory serves as a log for all of the API requests made by the Server and received by the Server
        • linkedList
          EnhancedLinkedList linkedList
          The EnhacnedLinkedList linkedList instance variables is the linkedlist that the client will send API requests to modify.
        • LinkedListDisplay
          JTextArea LinkedListDisplay
          The JTextArea is a JTextArea where the LinkedListDisplay String representation will be output to, so changes to the linked list can be observed
        • socket
          DatagramSocket socket
          The DatagramSocket socket is the socket rhough with the server will send a receive Datagram packets to and from the client
